item.title: create
item.dc:creator: praveen
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main] [this_collection.css /] [if.equal lhs="{module.form-config}" rhs=""] [if.empty module.form_config_service] [template.set error_message]

Form config service not provided!

[/template.set] [template.return template.error_message /] [/if.empty] //** Short of above if condition [template.return template.error_array empty='{module.form_config_service}' /] **// [if.not_empty module.form_config_service] [service.run {module.form_config_service} set="module.form-config" /] [/if.not_empty] [/if.equal] [if.empty module.form-config.groups] [template.set error]

Service not found or wrong service provided, form configration array is empty!


[aw2.get module.form-config /] [/template.set] [template.return template.error /] [/if.empty] [session_ticket.create {token} set='module.token' /] //** [html.trusted] **// //** remove from form class > [module.get form_layout default="top-label" /]**//
[loop.@gr module.form-config.groups] [this_collection.group.render data="{@gr.item}" default_form_control_service="{module.form-config.form_control_service}" /] [/loop.@gr]
[if.equal lhs='{module.form-config.prev_button}' rhs='yes'] [/if.equal] [if.equal lhs='{module.form-config.next_button}' rhs='yes'] [/if.equal] [if.equal lhs='{module.form-config.submit_button}' rhs='yes'] [/if.equal]
//** [/html.trusted] **// //** To generate session ticket **// [template.set submit_to="{module.submit_to}" not_empty="{module.submit_to}" /] [if.empty submit_to] [php.explode p1="." p2="{module.form-config.save_handler}" p3="1" set="template.save_handler_exploded" /] [if.not_equal lhs="{template.save_handler_exploded.1}"] [module.set collection_type="{template.save_handler_exploded.0}" /] [template.set submit_to="{template.save_handler_exploded.1}" /] [/if.not_equal] [/if.empty] [this_collection.ticket.generate collection_type='{module.collection_type}' submit_to='{template.submit_to}' form_config_service='{module.form_config_service}' callback_service='{module.form-config.callback_service}' extra_params='{module.extra_params}' token="{module.token}" o.set='template.ticket' /] [/templates.add] //** caling [aw_form.create form_config_service="ils_form_config.multi-service-config.template_late_fees" collection_type='{app.collection.modules.post_type}' submit_to='{app.active.module}.save_step_1' /] **//

item.title: ticket
item.dc:creator: praveen
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add generate] //** Create ticket **// [session_ticket.create nonce=yes set=template.ticket/] //** Create collection (module.collection.post_type ki value) array **//
[if.not_empty template.submit_to] [arr.create set="template.collection_array"] [post_type][template.get collection_type /][/post_type] [/arr.create] //** Set activity against the ticket **// [session_ticket.set_activity {template.ticket} collection={template.collection_array} module='{template.submit_to}' /] [/if.not_empty]
[if.empty template.submit_to] [arr.create set="template.collection_array"] [post_type][module.collection.post_type /][/post_type] [/arr.create] //** Set activity against the ticket **// [session_ticket.set_activity {template.ticket} collection={template.collection_array} module='auto-save' /] [/if.empty]
[session_ticket.set {template.token} field="form_config_service" value="{template.form_config_service}" /] [session_ticket.set {template.token} field="callback_service" value="{template.callback_service}" /] [loop.@eachExtra template.extra_params] [session_ticket.set {template.token} field="{@eachExtra.key}" value="{@eachExtra.item}" /] [/loop.@eachExtra]
[template.return template.ticket/] [/templates.add]

item.title: group
item.dc:creator: praveen
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add render] [module.set default_form_control_service="{template.default_form_control_service}" /]
[if.not_empty template.data.label] [template.data.label /] [/if.not_empty]
[loop.@fields template.data.section] [aw2.get @fields.item.field /] [aw2.get @fields.item.tabs /] [/loop.@fields] //**Default looping here**// [loop.@field template.data.field] [if.not_equal rhs="{template.key}" lhs="tabs"] [templates.run run_field /] [/if.not_equal] [/loop.@field] //** TABs: START **// [if.greater_than_zero @gr.item.tabs.count]
    [loop.@tab @gr.item.tabs]
  • [aw2.get @tab.item.label /]
    • [/loop.@tab]
[/if.greater_than_zero] [if.greater_than_zero @gr.item.tabs.count]
[loop.@tab @gr.item.tabs]
//**[aw2.get @tab.item.class /]**//
[loop.@field @tab.item.field] [templates.run run_field /] [/loop.@field]
[/loop.@tab]
[/if.greater_than_zero] //** TABs: END **//
[/templates.add] [templates.add run_field] [template.set value="{@field.item.value}" /] //** env.set postdata="query_result" in Settings App > Module Home **// [if.empty template.value] [env.get postdata.meta.{@field.key} set="template.value" /] [/if.empty] [if.empty template.value] [env.get meta_data.{@field.key} set="template.value" /] [/if.empty] [template.set service_name="form_control.{@field.item.type}" /] //** Default **// [if.not_empty @field.item.form_control_service] [template.set service_name="{@field.item.form_control_service}.{@field.item.type}" /] [/if.not_empty] [if.else not_empty="{module.default_form_control_service}"] [template.set service_name="{module.default_form_control_service}.{@field.item.type}" /] [/if.else] //** TODO: attributes should be dynamic, so not need to edit this when new attribute introduced **// [service.run {template.service_name} id={@field.key} label="{@field.item.label}" parent_class="{@field.item.parent_class}" in_class="{@field.item.in_class}" class="{@field.item.class}" placeholder="{@field.item.placeholder}" value="{template.value}" selected="{@field.item.selected}" taxonomy="{@field.item.taxonomy}" term='{@field.item.term}' options="{@field.item.options}" options_array="{@field.item.options}" user-role="{@field.item.user-role}" posttype="{@field.item.post_type}" args="{@field.item.args}" tooltip="{@field.item.tooltip}" upload_label="{@field.item.upload_label}" multiple="{@field.item.multiple}" required="{@field.item.required}" checked="{@field.item.checked}" readonly="{@field.item.readonly}" meta_type="{@field.item.meta_type}" /] [/templates.add]

item.title: css
item.dc:creator: praveen

item.title: auto-save
item.dc:creator: praveen
item.content:encoded: [templates.add main] //** [template.set_array ack status="error" int_reason="meta is not provided." reason="meta is required." /] [template.return template.ack empty='{module.meta}' /] **// [session_ticket.get {request.id} set="template.ticket_data" /] [if.not_empty template.ticket_data.form_config_service] [service.run {template.ticket_data.form_config_service} set="module.form-config" /] [/if.not_empty] //** return_type = array | js **// [if.equal lhs="{module.form-config.do_validation}" rhs=""] [/if.equal] [if.or lhs="{module.form-config.do_validation}" rhs="yes"] [aw_form.validate-form.process form_config_service="{template.ticket_data.form_config_service}" set="template.validation_result" /] [template.return template.validation_result not_empty="{template.validation_result}" /] //** [/if.or] **// [/if.or] //** Form data save **// [if.equal lhs="{module.form-config.save_handler}" rhs=""] //** Save data **// [if.empty template.validation_result] [templates.run save_data_user_defined /] [template.set html] [/template.set] [/if.empty] [/if.equal] [if.not_empty module.form-config.save_handler] [service.run {module.form-config.save_handler} set="template.html" /] [/if.not_empty] [if.not_empty module.form-config.callback_handler] [service.run {module.form-config.callback_handler} set="template.html" /] [/if.not_empty] [template.return template.html /] [/templates.add] [templates.add save_data_user_defined] [if.not_empty module.form-config.col] [loop.@eachAllowedFields module.form-config.col] [module.set form_meta="" /] [loop.@eachKey @eachAllowedFields.item.fields.comma] [aw2.get @eachKey.item set="template.column" /] [aw2.get request.{template.column} set="template.value" /] [module.set_array form_meta.new meta_key="{template.column}" meta_value="{template.value}" coll_type="{@eachAllowedFields.item.coll_type default=info}" /] [/loop.@eachKey] [templates.run send_to_db meta_table="{@eachAllowedFields.item.meta_table default=form_meta}" object_id="{@eachAllowedFields.item.object_id}" coll_id="{@eachAllowedFields.item.coll_id default=form}" /] [/loop.@eachAllowedFields] [/if.not_empty] [/templates.add] [templates.add send_to_db] [template.set object_id="FORM{unique_number}" empty="{template.object_id}" /] [templates.run default_metas /] [php.array_merge p1="{module.form_meta}" p2="{module.default_meta}" set="template.meta" /] [db.meta.update_object_meta meta='{template.meta}' meta_table='{template.meta_table}' object_id='{template.object_id}' coll_id='{template.coll_id default=form}' /] [/templates.add] [templates.add default_metas] [php.date p1="Y-m-d" set="template.date" /] [php.date p1="Y-m-d H:i:s" set="template.dttime" /] [php.time set="template.timeseconds" /] [aw2.get server_variables.REMOTE_ADDR set="template.ip" /] [aw2.get server_variables.HTTP_REFERER set="template.referer" /] [template.set coll_type="general" empty="{template.coll_type}" /] [module.set_array default_meta="" /] [module.set_array default_meta.new meta_key="created_by" meta_value="{current_user.user_login}" coll_type='{template.coll_type}' /] [module.set_array default_meta.new meta_key="created_date" meta_value="{template.date}" coll_type='{template.coll_type}' /] [module.set_array default_meta.new meta_key="created_datetime" meta_value="{template.dttime}" coll_type='{template.coll_type}' /] [module.set_array default_meta.new meta_key="created_timeseconds" meta_value="{template.timeseconds}" coll_type='{template.coll_type}' /] [module.set_array default_meta.new meta_key="ip" meta_value="{template.ip}" coll_type='{template.coll_type}' /] [module.set_array default_meta.new meta_key="referer" meta_value="{template.referer}"coll_type='{template.coll_type}' /] [module.set_array default_meta.new meta_key="src" meta_value="{request.src}" coll_type='{template.coll_type}' /] [/templates.add]

item.title: validation
item.dc:creator: praveen

item.title: validate-form
item.dc:creator: praveen
item.content:encoded:
//** @param string form_config_service e.g. alpha_form_config.registration-form-config @param array request @description - This template will call service to get the field group from form config and render validation attribute for each field. Based on that it will find the value from request.{field.name} and check the validation using the module "validation" present in this service **// [templates.add process]
[if.not_empty template.form_config_service] [service.run {template.form_config_service} set="module.form-config" /] [/if.not_empty]
[if.not_empty template.form-config] [template.get form-config set="module.form-config" /] [/if.not_empty]
[module.set error_fields="" /]
[loop.@grp module.form-config.groups] [loop.@fields @grp.item.field] [if.not_empty @fields.item.validation] [template.set current_field="" /] [loop.@eachRule @fields.item.validation.comma] [aw2.get request.{@fields.key} set="template.value" /] [service.run aw_form.validation.{@eachRule.item} field="{@fields.key}" label="{@fields.item.label}" value="{template.value}" set="template.result" /] [if.equal rhs="{template.result.status}" lhs="error"] [module.set_array error_fields.new field="{@fields.key}" label="{@fields.item.label}" reason="{template.result.reason}" empty="{template.current_field}" /] [template.set current_field="{@fields.key}" /] [/if.equal] [/loop.@eachRule] [/if.not_empty] [/loop.@fields] [/loop.@grp]
[module.set js="" /]
[if.not_empty module.error_fields] [module.set js] <script type="spa/axn" axn="core.run_script"> [loop.@eachField module.error_fields] $('[request.get bind_selector /] .form-group.[aw2.get @eachField.item.field /]').addClass('has-error'); $('[request.get bind_selector /] .form-group.[aw2.get @eachField.item.field /] .help-block').text('[aw2.get @eachField.item.reason /]'); [/loop.@eachField]
$('html, body').animate({scrollTop: $('[request.get bind_selector /] .form-group.has-error:first').offset().top}, 1000); $('[request.get bind_selector /] .form-group.has-error:first .form-control').focus(); </script> [/module.set] [/if.not_empty]
[if.equal lhs="{template.return_type}" rhs="array"] [template.return module.error_fields /] [/if.equal]
[template.return module.js /] [/templates.add]
